attributes.action: Save Royal Mail by returning it to the National institution it should be.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The "Royal Mail" service carries the seal of our monarch (a stamp), the contents being conveyed on her behalf, delivering communication from person to person in safety. I have just received my post split & torn, damaged, and very wet. Please Mr Brown, save our mail service and our post offices, by returning them to the national status they never should have been taken from. Privatisation will destroy it. Ensure their staff are not overstretched as current news implies, and not given rounds to complete in impossible time scales. Save our postman!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
